channel.title: fatty acid on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in fatty acid on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnFAX6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC05G0364600WE Gene Symbol: BnFAX6 Gene Name: Fatty Acid Export 6 Genome: ZS11 reference genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Fatty acid export protein BnFAX6 functions in lipid synthesis and axillary bud growth in Brassica napus.

item.title: BnWRI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnWRI1 Gene Name: AP2/EREBP transcription factor Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnWRI1 coordinates fatty acid biosynthesis and photosynthesis pathways during oil accumulation in rapeseed.

item.title: FAD2-1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma10g42470 Gene Symbol: FAD2-1A Gene Name: omega-6 fatty acid desaturase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Mutant alleles of FAD2-1A and FAD2-1Bcombine to produce soybeans with the high oleic acid seed oil trait.

item.title: FAD2-1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma20g24530 Gene Symbol: FAD2-1B Gene Name: omega-6 fatty acid desaturase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Mutant alleles of FAD2-1A and FAD2-1Bcombine to produce soybeans with the high oleic acid seed oil trait.

item.title: GhACS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhACS1 Gene Name: ACS-like protein Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The GhACS1 gene encodes an acyl-CoA synthetase which is essential for normal microsporogenesis in early anther development of cotton。 Real-time quantitative RT-PCR and northern blot analyses revealed that GhACS1 transcripts were predominantly accumulated in the developing anthers of cotton.

item.title: GhBZR3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G0312 Gene Symbol: GhBZR3 Gene Name: Genome: genome version is NBI v1.

item.title: GhCYP703A2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir D12G012350.1 Gene Symbol: GhCYP703A2 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum (TM-1) reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cytochrome P450 mono-oxygenase CYP703A2 plays a central role in sporopollenin formation and ms5ms6 fertility in cotton.

item.title: GhFAD2-1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A13G1850 Gene Symbol: GhFAD2-1A Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Functional Genomics Database (https://cottonfgd.

item.title: GhL1L1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D05G1686 Gene Symbol: GhL1L1 Gene Name: Leafy cotyledon1-like 1 Genome: Cotton Functional Genomics Database (https://cottonfgd.

item.title: GhSSI2-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhSSI2-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhSSI2-C
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-C Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhWIN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A07G036100 Gene Symbol: GhWIN2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton GhWIN2 gene activates the cuticle biosynthesis pathway and influences the salicylic and jasmonic acid biosynthesis pathways.

item.title: GmACP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18g244300 Gene Symbol: GmACP Gene Name: acyl carrier protein Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmFAD2–1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G278000 Gene Symbol: GmFAD2–1A Gene Name: Fatty Acid Desaturase 2 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Demonstration of highly efficient dual gRNA CRISPR/Cas9 editing of the homeologous GmFAD2–1A and GmFAD2–1B genes to yield a high oleic, low linoleic and α-linolenic acid phenotype in soybean.

item.title: GmFAD2–1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.20G111000 Gene Symbol: GmFAD2–1B Gene Name: Fatty Acid Desaturase 2 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Demonstration of highly efficient dual gRNA CRISPR/Cas9 editing of the homeologous GmFAD2–1A and GmFAD2–1B genes to yield a high oleic, low linoleic and α-linolenic acid phenotype in soybean.

item.title: GmFATA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gyma.18G167300 Gene Symbol: GmFATA1 Gene Name: acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterases GmFATA1 and GmFATA2 are essential for fatty acid accumulation and growth in soybean.

item.title: GmFATA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G349200 Gene Symbol: GmFATA2 Gene Name: acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterase 2 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterases GmFATA1 and **GmFATA2 **are essential for fatty acid accumulation and growth in soybean.

item.title: GmPDCT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G213100.1 Gene Symbol: GmPDCT1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Design of high-monounsaturated fatty acid soybean seed oil using GmPDCTs knockout via a CRISPR-Cas9 system.

item.title: HvWIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvWIN1 Gene Name: WAX INDUCER1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: WAX INDUCER1 (HvWIN1) transcription factor regulates free fatty acid biosynthetic genes to reinforce cuticle to resist Fusarium head blight in barley spikelets.

item.title: LeFAD7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeFAD7 Gene Name: omega-3 fatty acid desaturase7 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Loss of Function of FATTY ACID DESATURASE7 (LeFAD7) in Tomato Enhances Basal Aphid Resistance in a Salicylate-Dependent Manner.

item.title: LeGPAT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeGPAT Gene Name: glycerol-3-phosphate acyltransferase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: A tomato (Solanum lycopersicum Mill.

item.title: NtFAD2–2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtFAD2–2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: We suggested that mutation of the seed-type NtFAD2–2 genes will not affect the fatty acid desaturation in tobacco leaves, because of the function redundancy of NtFAD2–1 genes in vegetative tissues.

item.title: NtFAD2–2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtFAD2–2b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: We suggested that mutation of the seed-type NtFAD2–2 genes will not affect the fatty acid desaturation in tobacco leaves, because of the function redundancy of NtFAD2–1 genes in vegetative tissues.

item.title: PpFAD3-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.6G056100 Gene Symbol: PpFAD3-1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: Peach fruit PpNAC1 activates PpFAD3-1 transcription to provide ω-3 fatty acids for the synthesis of short-chain flavor volatiles.

item.title: PpNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.4G187100 Gene Symbol: PpNAC1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor PpNAC1 and DNA demethylase PpDML1 synergistically regulate peach fruit ripening.

item.title: StMYB144
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.Atl_v3.07_1G012240.1 Gene Symbol: StMYB144 Gene Name: myeloblastosis transcription factor 144 Genome: Annotation (v3) for the Phased Assembly of Atlantic Tetraploid Potato Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMYB24, StMYB144, and StMYB168 positively regulate suberin biosynthesis at potato tuber wounds during healing.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.Atl_v3.02_4G016430.1 Gene Symbol: StMYB24 Gene Name: myeloblastosis transcription factor 24 Genome: Annotation (v3) for the Phased Assembly of Atlantic Tetraploid Potato Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMYB24, StMYB144, and StMYB168 positively regulate suberin biosynthesis at potato tuber wounds during healing.

item.title: TaFAD3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaFAD3 Gene Name: omega-3 fatty acid desaturase Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Temperature-dependent translational regulation of the ER omega-3 fatty acid desaturase gene in wheat root tips.
